data.actual_result: Their behavior are inconsistent between each other: one clears the query upon going back while the other keeps it
data.expected_result: Going back from either Add Friend or Join Server should have a similar behavior
data.short_description: In Quick Switcher, when your query gives no results, going back from Add a Friend screen won't have the same behavior as going back from Join a Server screen
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Quick Switcher - Type nonsense stuff in the input box to have no results - Tap the Add Friend button - Go back. Notice you still have the text in the input box  - Now tap the Join Server button - Go back. Notice how the contents of the QS got reset
